Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Ministry of Trade and Industry" Singapore – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(April 2019)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* The **Ministry of Trade and Industry** (**MTI**; [Malay](/wiki/Malay_language): *Kementerian Perdagangan dan Perusahaan*; [Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 新加坡贸易与工业部; [Tamil](/wiki/Tamil_language): வர்த்தக, தொழில் அமைச்சு) is a [ministry](/wiki/Ministry_(government_department)) of the [government of Singapore](/wiki/Government_of_Singapore) responsible for the formulation and implementation of policies related to the development of business, trade and industry in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). ## Organisational structure 9 statutory boards and one government department are under the Ministry’s purview. The nine Statutory Boards comprises: - [Agency for Science, Technology and Research](/wiki/Agency_for_Science,_Technology_and_Research) (A*STAR), - [Economic Development Board](/wiki/Economic_Development_Board) (EDB), - [Enterprise Singapore](/wiki/Enterprise_Singapore), - [Jurong Town Corporation](/wiki/Jurong_Town_Corporation) (JTC), - [Singapore Tourism Board](/wiki/Singapore_Tourism_Board) (STB), - [Competition and Consumer Commission of Singapore](/wiki/Competition_and_Consumer_Commission_of_Singapore) (CCCS), - [Energy Market Authority](/wiki/Energy_Market_Authority) (EMA), - Hotels Licensing Board (HLB), and - [Sentosa Development Corporation](/wiki/Sentosa_Development_Corporation) (SDC). The one government department is called Singapore Department of Statistics (DOS). ## List of ministers The Ministry is headed by the **Minister for Trade and Industry**, who is appointed as part of the [Cabinet of Singapore](/wiki/Cabinet_of_Singapore). ### Minister for Trade and Industry (1979–2015) MinisterTook officeLeft officePartyCabinet**[Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong)** MP for [Marine Parade](/wiki/Marine_Parade_Constituency) (born 1941)15 March 197931 May 1981[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Lee K.
